sample_news.title: Cocoa Prices are Falling. When Will Chocolate Get Cheaper?
sample_news.content: Cocoa prices have dropped from their 2024 peak — but don't expect chocolate bargains this holiday season. When will prices finally fall? Harry Black explains. (Source: Bloomberg)

sample_news.title: Cocoa Prices Are Plunging. Why Is Chocolate Still So Expensive?
sample_news.content: After last year’s historic rally, cocoa prices are heading for a record annual slump. But there’s no sign the cost of your candies, bars or chocolate Santas will follow any time soon.

sample_news.title: Modi Fast-Tracks Reforms to Shield Economy From US Tariffs
sample_news.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government pushed through far-reaching policy reforms in the final parliamentary session of the year, seeking to bolster the economy in the face of trade headwinds.
